reviews.review: Havent played a game with more toxic community than this one. I really recommend it, especially if youre having troubles deciding wether or not to kill yourself. After playing it for more than an hour you will be regreting not jumping out of the window right away while getting death threats from sweaty 12yo inbred kids at the same time.
If you like heart beating and rusty hooks, This game is perfect for you! Love to run around a wall threw windows and throw wood on big humans chasing you with melee weapons (huntress exeption)

Наиграв дохрена часов в DbD могу сказать что игра сырая как будто они еще лет 5 собираются ее тестировать. Постоянно меняются скилы, способности, маньяки без причин. Теперь добавили сервера и игра превратилась в сплошной рандом, в одинаковых ситуациях ты то успеваешь за сурва кинуть доску и оглушить точно такой же ситуации ты уже не успеваешь ибо пинг. За маньяков теперь хрен кого оттащишь если сурв: чинит, спасает, ломает тотем и тд, потому что просто достаточно просто в момент анимации хвата нажать бег и маньяк секунду стоит, а ты бежишь. Вывод: брать на свой страх и риск, и надеется что ее доделают в будущем.

bu awk oyununda kanser olma oranınız normal bir insana göre %200 artar. Onun bunun çocuğu ruslar her oyunda olduğu gibi bu oyunda da keyfinizin içine camp, tunnel ve bilimum toxiclikleri yaparak eder. Üstüne de gelip sana ırkçı derler. Sadece arkadaş arasında birbirinizi kesmek isterseniz ya da katil oynayacaksanız son derece güzel oyun tavsiye ederim. Düzgün bir katile denk geldiğiniz zaman da keza aynı şekilde son derece zevk alarak oynarsınız. Ama bu oyundaki o onun bunun çocuğu toxic kitleden birisine denk gelirseniz kafayı yemeniz içten bile değil. Şu yapımcılar oyuna gayet güzel bakıyorlar geliştirme ve karakter bakımından ama keşke adam akıllı bi report sistemi, ban sistemi gelse de şu ölmüş annelerini sevdiklerime artık denk gelmesek. (Bu yorum üst üste 5 6 toxic katile denk gelip rage quit atıldıktan sonra yazılmıştır.)


250 saat sonra gelen edit: Şu anasını siktiğimin oyununda ruini değiştirerek katil olarak oynamanın amına koydunuz hadi(maini survivor olan biri olarak söylüyorum katiller gen rushı çoğu zaman engelleyemiyor.). Bari bre amına koduklarım ben eğer 7-8 ranksam siktiğimin survivorları 1 rank olarak doluşmasınlar. ben 600 saat oynamışsam bana 3k saat oynamış adamlar denk gelmesin. Sokarım yapacağınız matchmaking sistemine.

Eigentlich ein gutes Game ABER statt das sich Überlebende immer über Killer beschweren die an einem Harken campen, sollten einige überlebende da draußen mal überlegen wie ehrenwert es ist Killer in Animationen mit ihren SCHEI* Taschenlampen Abzuf*cken während sie keinerlei Möglichkeit haben etwas dagegen zu unternehmen da sie sich nicht ich wiederhole, !!!NICHT!!! bewegen oder sonstiges machen können. Die die sowas dennoch machen und sich darüber aufregen das ein Killer campt können hier gerne ihre klappe halten wenn ihr mich fragt denn als Killer zu campen ist ebenso ehrenlos wie als überlebender Leute zu blenden die bis Ablauf der Animation nichts unternehmen können um sich dagegen zu wehr zu setzen. Ich wette das es da draußen einige Leute gibt die gerne als Killer spielen und meinen punkt absolut nachvollziehen können. Also Leute, geht den killern nicht auf die Nüsse selbiges gilt auch für die Killer!!!

This game is rife with cheaters and hacks and BHVR just tries to hide shit instead of fix it.  They're also incredibly shit at balance, and the game is heavily tilted in favor of one side over the other.  The community is extremely toxic, generally.  It's entirely designed in UE4 Blueprints (think RPGMaker for FPS) making it one of worst optimized games I've ever played.

If not for these things, the game would be much better than it is.

EDIT: I also forgot, some of the worst matchmaking imaginable - brand new players against hardened vets is the norm.

There are also absolutely no assistive technologies such as for color blindness or hearing issues.  There isn't even a Brightness or Gamma slider in a HORROR GAME.

EDIT2:  The progression system is unmitigated endless grind, you cannot use perks you paid for in DLC without grinding a million hours worth of blood points first.  To actually max an account takes 1.5 BILLION bloodpoints, a perfect game, as a killer which gets the most, is 32k.  People with 8,000 hours don't have everything.

This is actually a bad Korean F2P game in quality, grind, and monetization.  Their devs and forum moderators are some of the thinnest skinned woke PC garbage to ever walk the Earth.

They also have the most anti-consumer "battle pass" style system I've ever seen - even if you play at the highest level and play this game as a full time job it's designed for you to spend extra cash on getting tier unlocks because grinding them is impossible.  There are many posts you an find about the math.

This is a pretty fun game it's essentially Valhalla if you died has the warrior kid from home alone If you play Survivor prepare to use your wits and break dancing skills to annoy and potentially stun the burglars (killers), The odds are kind of stacked against you but when has that stopped you before? It's your house you've got to defend it! If you play Killer you can expect Survivors to be a bunch of punk ass Ferris Buellers it's time to make them go back to school (death school), oh you can definitely kill them and you should, But they have annoying tricks up their sleeve Murder them with a Mori, or feed them to Buzz's Turantula I leave the choice to you!
